comment: The only gripe if one could call it that even, is the initial intro portion. If the IDE installation could be introduced first.... Awesome !!!
Amazing course. Being an automation tester, trying to learn frontend techs, this course was awesome. Good Work guys.

A very good start, some great subjects covered and examples provided. I felt that once we got into React, API'd and other frameworks it was rushed and more difficult for someone to follow along and listen.
